backgroundInformationList.description: Notice of Passing of By-law - 478 Huron Street

contact.contactName: Toronto and East York Community Council

noticeDescription: Take notice that the Council of the City of Toronto has passed By-law 1793-2019 to designate 478 Huron Street (University-Rosedale, Ward 11) as being of cultural heritage value or interest.

otherReferenceList.description: By-law 1793-2019 - To amend By-law 1640-2019, being a by-law to designate the property at 478 Huron Street as being of cultural heritage value or interest, to correct a technical error.
By-law 1640-2019 - To designate the property at 478 Huron Street as being of cultural heritage value or interest.

2019.PB7.4 - Alterations to Heritage Properties at 300 Bloor Street West and 478 Huron Street, Intention to Designate under Part IV, Section 29 of the Ontario Heritage Act and Authority to Enter into Heritage Easement Agreements at 300 Bloor Street West and 478 Huron Street

subheading: In the Matter of the Ontario Heritage Act R.S.O. 1990 Chapter 0.18 and 478 Huron Street, City of Toronto, Province of Ontario
title: Notice of Passing of By-law - 478 Huron Street
topics: Heritage > Designation of a heritage property
